CustomField.description: If deselected, when a schedule's date range is changed, schedule exceptions that are partly or wholly outside the schedule's date range are deleted. Note: This potentially alters part of the schedule that is still within range. If selected, when a schedule's date range is changed, schedule exceptions that are wholly outside the schedule's date range are deleted. Schedule exceptions that are partly outside the schedule's date range are shortened to fit within the new schedule date range.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When true, schedule exceptions are retained on update in the Edit Assignment Schedule screen. When false, exceptions are deleted. Default value is false.
CustomField.label: Retain schedule exceptions on update
